description.b: Become an expert in the field
description.a: Understand and be responsible for carrying out work correctly
description.i: Doing the right thing, in an honest, fair and responsible manner
description.k: Work collaboratively, full of harmony and mutual respect

corporateValue.visi: The most efficient ammonia producing company in the world

misi.a: Caring about quality, safety, health and the environment (QSHE)
misi.b: Focus on factory productivity and reliability

Insignificant.asset: Plant operates normally with insignificant disturbances
Insignificant.reputasi: Plant operates normally with insignificant disturbances
Insignificant.securitySiber: Use of unregistered hardware without company data loss

minor.asset: Plant operates normally with disturbances requiring on-site repair
minor.reputasi: Plant operates normally with disturbances requiring on-site repair
minor.securityFisik: Unauthorized entry, no loss, but causing discomfort
minor.securitySiber: System down for less than 2 hours

asset.a1: Plant operates abnormally and requires repair by reducing production rate

moderate.securitySiber: System down for 2-8 hours, permanent company data loss

major.manusia: Lost workday case or permanent disability

asset.a1: Plant shutdown with repairs required for up to 5 days

major.lingkungan: Pollution affecting the community, leading to public protests
major.securityFisik: Unauthorized entry, loss of more than 1 item
major.securitySiber: System hacked, undetected, and remotely controllable

asset.a1: Plant shutdown requiring repairs for more than 5 days

Catastrophic.lingkungan: Environmental pollution leading to legal claims
